properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: The Name of the Company.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: created
properties.label: Created
properties.description: The timestamp this document was created.
properties.errMsg: This field must have an ISO Timestamp.

properties.name: modified
properties.label: Modified
properties.description: The timestamp this document was last modified.
properties.errMsg: This field must have an ISO Timestamp.

properties.name: version
properties.label: Version
properties.description: The version of the transparency information.
properties.errMsg: This field must have an integer value.

properties.name: language
properties.label: Language
properties.description: The language tag of this document.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a valid language abbreviation code.

properties.name: status
properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of whether this policy is actively in use.
properties.errMsg: This field must be either be 'active' or 'inactive'.

properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: The URL under which the privacy policy can be found.
properties.errMsg: This field must be filled in.

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: Name of the Controller.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: division
properties.label: Division
properties.description: Serves to differentiate between different areas of a company; particularly relevant for large companies.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: address
properties.label: Address
properties.description: Address of the controller.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: country
properties.label: Country
properties.description: Country location of the controller.
properties.errMsg: All country codes follow the established ones ISO 3166 country abbreviation standard.

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: Name of the representative.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: email
properties.label: E-Mail
properties.description: E-Mail address of the representative.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone
properties.description: Phone number of the representative.
properties.errMsg: Must be a valid phone number such as: '+49 151 1234 5678'

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: The full name of the Data Protection Officer.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: address
properties.label: Address
properties.description: The Address of the Data Protection Officer.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: country
properties.label: Country
properties.description: The country of the Data Protection Officer.
properties.errMsg: All country codes follow the established ones ISO 3166 country abbreviation standard.

properties.name: email
properties.label: E-Mail
properties.description: The contact email address of the Data Protection Officer.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone
properties.description: The phone number of the Data Protection Officer (may include country prefix).
properties.errMsg: Must be a valid phone number such as: '+49 151 1234 5678'

properties.name: id
properties.label: ID
properties.description: The id of a data item that is disclosed. The id is necessary to distinguish several processing tasks of the same data item (locally unique ID that can be based on the database implementation).
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: category
properties.label: Category
properties.description: The data (category) the data disclosed is referred to.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: purpose
properties.label: Purpose
properties.description: In this schema the purpose is specified (i.e. a headline or purpose category).he id of a data item that is disclosed. The id is necessary to distinguish several processing tasks of the same data item (locally unique ID that can be based on the database implementation).
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: This schema refers to an exact description of the purpose the data is processed for.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: reference
properties.label: Reference
properties.description: This field refers to the reference in legal regulations (laws, orders, declaration etc.).
properties.errMsg: The format is set to uppercase letters for the legal text followed by hyphened numbers and lowercase letters for the exact location.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: An explanation about the legal basis used.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: exists
properties.label: Exists
properties.description: The legitimate interest only has to be stated if the processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 13 (1d). This field refers to the existence of such an interest.

properties.name: reasoning
properties.label: Reasoning
properties.description: If the legitimate interest has to be stated because the processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 13 (1d), it is described in here.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.description: The name of the third party (recipient).
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: division
properties.label: Division
properties.description: The division of the third party (recipient) for structuring controllers into smaller entities.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: address
properties.label: Address
properties.description: The address of the third party (recipient).
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: country
properties.label: Country
properties.description: The country in which the recipient is located at. Attention: This explictly specifies third country transfers!
properties.errMsg: This field needs to be a country code. It is not required.

properties.name: category
properties.label: Category
properties.description: The category of the the recipient.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: aggregateFunction
properties.label: Aggregation function
properties.description: The aggregation function describes the calculation basis when specifying several time intervals. For example, if there is storage for 2 weeks for technical reasons (e.g. backup), but there is a legally longer retention period, the maximum aggregation function (max) would be selected (standard case).
properties.errMsg: Aggregation functions available: min, max, sum, avg

properties.name: legalRequirement
properties.label: Legal requirement
properties.description: Is there a legal requirement to collect these data?

properties.name: contractualRegulation
properties.label: Aggregation function
properties.description: Is there a contractual regulation to collect these data?

properties.name: obligationToProvide
properties.label: Obligation to Provide information
properties.description: Is there an obligation for the data subject to provide these data?

properties.name: consequences
properties.label: Consequences
properties.description: Description of the consequences in the case of non-disclosure.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: The description why the data has to be stored.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: ttl
properties.label: Time to live
properties.description: The TTL (Time-to-Live) specifies the lifetime of this data (category).
properties.errMsg: It follows the ISO 8601 for time spans.

properties.name: value
properties.label: Value
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: legalbasis
properties.label: Value
properties.description: This must be a reference to a law text.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: country
properties.label: Country
properties.description: The country code of the third country.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: available
properties.label: Available
properties.description: Adequacy decision by the European commission exists?

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: Description of the adequacy decision by the European commission.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: available
properties.label: Available
properties.description: Do suitable guarantees according to Art. 45 exist?

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: Description of suitable guarantees according to Art. 45
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: available
properties.label: Available
properties.description: Presence of enforceable rights and effective remedies?

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: Description of enforceable rights and effective remedies.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: available
properties.label: Available
properties.description: Does a standard data protection clause exist?

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: An explanation about the standard data protection clause (may include link).
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: inUse
properties.label: In use
properties.description: Is automated decision making in use?

properties.name: logicInvolved
properties.label: Logic involved
properties.description: An explanation about the logic involved to automated decision making.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: scopeAndIntendedEffects
properties.label: Scope and intended effects
properties.description: Scope and intended effects of such processing for the data subject.
properties.errMsg: This field can be anything. It is not required.

properties.name: id
properties.label: ID
properties.description: This refers to an locally unique ID in an arbitrary but deterministic format.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: dataCategory
properties.label: Data category
properties.description: The category the data refer to.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: Description of the source the data is taken from.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: URL (reference) where the data is taken from.
properties.errMsg: This field must have a value.

properties.name: publiclyAvailable
properties.label: Publicly available
properties.description: Are these data publicly available?
